        """This is an extension to the normal ec2_api"""

Rescue instance in EC2 api does not work. The function needs to be tested and corrected
title: EC2API: rescue instance does not work

def rescue_instance(self, context, instance_id, **kwargs):

        self._do_instance(self.compute_api.rescue, contect, instnace_id)      <---two misspellings
